messages.title: A CHAMPION FOR OUR AREA
messages.content: 1. LOCAL CHAMPION - Zac Goldsmith has delivered on the issues that concern residents and immediately put the needs of residents above party politics. 2. HOLDING GOVERNMENT TO ACCOUNT - Zac led the campaign to bring in Recall powers to make MPs more accountable, and he's sponsored an EU referendum Bill. 3. GOOD REASONS TO RETURN ZAC GOLDSMITH

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Perceives Heathrow expansion as a serious threat and actively campaigns against their plans to expand.
Led the campaign for Recall powers to make MPs more accountable and sponsored an EU referendum Bill.

issues.brexitEurope: Zac sponsored an EU referendum Bill.
issues.governance: Zac led the campaign to bring in Recall powers to make MPs more accountable.

leaflet.personalStatement: Zac was elected in 2010 to represent Richmond Park and North Kingston where he has lived and familiarized himself with the community challenges. He is described as an independent-minded MP and effective campaigner, always holding the right of OGs above his own party interests.

politicalExperience.role: MP for Richmond Park and North Kingston
politicalExperience.achievements: Delivered on issues concerning residents, led campaign for Recall powers, sponsored EU referendum Bill, fought against Heathrow expansion.

endorsements.endorsement: Zac Goldsmith has repeatedly proved himself a politician of principle. Vowed to quit over Heathrow and demanded voters be given powers to recall shoddy MPs.

quotes.text: Zac Goldsmith has repeatedly proved himself a politician of principle. Vowed to quit over Heathrow and demanded voters be given powers to recall shoddy MPs.

images.caption: Zac Goldsmith standing up for Richmond Park and North Kingston.
Zac Goldsmith - A proud record in Parliament.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet contains summaries of Zac Goldsmith's positions on various issues, his achievements, a personal statement, and a quote from The Evening Standard endorsing him.
